verses.verse: The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> concerning <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> in a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7703>devastated<s%> [and] <S%H1820>ruined;<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> in a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7024>Kir<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7703>devastated<s%> [and] <S%H1820>ruined.<s%>

They have <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to the <S%H1004>temple<s%> and [to] <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> [even] to the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> to <S%H1065>weep.<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3213>wails<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and <S%H4311>Medeba;<s%> Everyone's <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H7144>bald<s%> [and] <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2206>beard<s%> is <S%H1639>cut<s%> <S%H1639>off.<s%>

In their <S%H2351>streets<s%> they have <S%H2296>girded<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> On their <S%H1406>housetops<s%> and in their <S%H7339>squares<s%> <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> is <S%H3213>wailing,<s%> <S%H3381>dissolved<s%> in <S%H1065>tears.<s%>

<S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh<s%> also <S%H2199>cry<s%> out, Their <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5704>all<s%> the <S%H5704>way<s%> to <S%H3096>Jahaz;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H9139>armed<s%> men of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H7321>cry<s%> <S%H7321>aloud;<s%> His <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3415>trembles<s%> within him.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2199>cries<s%> out for <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> His <S%H1281>fugitives<s%> are as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H6820>Zoar<s%> [and] Eglath-shelishiyah, For they <S%H5927>go<s%> up the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> <S%H1065>weeping;<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> on the <S%H1870>road<s%> to <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> they <S%H5782>raise<s%> a <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H2201>distress<s%> over [their] <S%H7667>ruin.<s%>

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> are <S%H4923>desolate.<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H2682>grass<s%> is <S%H3001>withered,<s%> the <S%H1877>tender<s%> <S%H1877>grass<s%> <S%H3615>died<s%> out, There is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H3418>thing.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3502>abundance<s%> [which] they have <S%H6213>acquired<s%> and <S%H6486>stored<s%> up They <S%H5375>carry<s%> off <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H6155>Arabim.<s%>

For the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H2201>distress<s%> has <S%H5362>gone<s%> <S%H5362>around<s%> the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> Its <S%H3215>wail<s%> [goes] as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H97>Eglaim<s%> and its <S%H3213>wailing<s%> even to Beer-elim.

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H1775>Dimon<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood;<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> I will <S%H7896>bring<s%> <S%H3254>added<s%> [woes] upon <S%H1775>Dimon,<s%> A <S%H9030>lion<s%> upon the <S%H6413>fugitives<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and upon the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H127>land.<s%>
